content.detailedDescription:
I had stayed up late christmas eve 1992 sewing christmas stockings for neices.  my spouse was in bed, no electronic equipment in home was on, just my sewing machine and light in hall w/my machine where i was sewing.  i went to kitchen for a glass of water and saw a huge glowing light in farm field directly across the street in front of house.  light was glowing w/what appreared to almost be objects? or movements within light.
i went into bdrm to wake my husband to look out bdrm window.  he awoke and remembers seeing the lights but could not stay awake.  i was aggravated as he always has been interested in the unknown, but could not stay awake.  i went back into kitchen to continue looking out window, only to see a entity that appeared to have a masculine type human form, very tall, 7-8 ft tall.  the only way i can describe it is as if it was a form surrounded by a neon light.  entity was standing by light pole directly across from the end of my driveway.  it was so clear, i then became frightened, because it was so close, i did not know what it was and thought if i can see it, maybe it can see me.  i was so scared i ran and got into bed w/my husband and just prayed for god not to let whatever it was to not bother us.  i fell asleep so i cannot say how? or when? light and/or entity left.
to this day i do not know what i saw, but i will never forget it.
content.summary: Huge glowing ball of white light observed, additionally seemed to be activity going on in light.  observed what seemed to be a human type masculine form at least 7-8 ft tall at light pole directly across from my driveway.

content.detailedDescription: Early after noon on easter sunday i was driving the tractor up the road in the feild and off to my left a disk shaped craft appeard out of no where traveled in a strait line and dematearlised
content.summary: Sliver disk

content.detailedDescription:
I am a beginning photography student and my instructor ordered us to take as many pictures as possible so that we could get an idea of how to use our cameras. i had been outside for some time and there was no aircraft in the area, it was kind of peaceful. i happened to spot a cloud that i wanted to capture on my camera. i took two images of the cloud at 4:51pm, in the first i was zoomed in too far but it shows nothing just the cloud. in the few seconds it took me to zoom out something appeared in the next image. they were consecutive images and until this moment i never knew that there was anything other than the cloud in the image. i didn't end up using it for my class so it was forgotten. i was hoping someone skilled might be able to tell me what the image is. i do not have the skill required to bring out the object. i have played with it a little but i can't make it out. the pictures i am providing are the originals the first without the object and the second with.  


i did not see the object until the image was brought up. it is in the center at the top of cloud in the image that is zoomed out. did i manage to catch a stealth plane on film? feel free to let me know if you figure it out.
content.summary: Just taking pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I was night hunting for hogs with a group of invtes on our hunting lease. after spending a good bit of time out in south texas night hunting for hogs. on the way back to camp just as we where making it up to the top of one of the senders of the ranch, all my invites and me where completely taken by surprise when a huge flash had just been set off over us. i'm talking about on top of us it looked like god had just taken a panoramic picture and we where in it. it was really cool it looked like stadium lights in the middle of no where. that was the end of my first sighting. one huge flash in the pitch black! 

second sighting was even better, me and two different invites are sitting around the camp fire. we had just gotten back to camp after spending the early evening hunting. it was about 10:00pm when there it was again. this time it gave me a better view of what i had seen a few months prior. it was two bright yellow orange light, they looked comparable to two vw beetle head lights in the sky and then one more light poped out and now is hovering in level with the other two. they sat there long enough for me to get to my binoculars and get a better look at what now looks like a yellow disco ball. ok so now i'm sitting there in total state of shock. the best part obout this hole light show in the sky is when all three lights ball up into just one light remainig same shape in size. that was the same size for obout 30 seconds and then it got tiny in size and whent from yellow orange to bright ruby red and then all the sudden it looked like this thing was a pin ball inside a pinball machine in the sky. and just like that it was gone and had me and my invites looking into the crystal clear night sky's of south texas. after that that night my invites and me realized that there are some powers of some sort that defiantly are way more advanced than i we are.
content.summary: Amazing specially when i've had 2 similar sightings with two different groups of invites on hunting ranch!

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and thought i saw a couple things, but then had to check my sanity - the 1st was what looked like a very short chemtrail - it could've been a cloud, but it was tiny and straight.  i thought i saw it hovering and it looked like the "typical" flying saucer.  then it was gone, nothing in the sky at that place, not even the "cloud".

i saw what looked like a plane maybe 20 ft down the road & pulled over to take a picture.  it was sooo small and looked like it could be a airplane, so i decided not to take a picture.  when i looked back up it appeared to have gone in a circle.  i thought planes didn't do that.  there is a small airport nearby (within 5-10 miles) & a major airport about 35 miles away.  

i got back on the road & turned in my subdivision.  this "star" caught my eye, because it looked "fake" or placed somehow, like a sky prop.  i stopped to take a picture in the day time because the sun was setting.  when i looked back to the sky after taking the first 3 photos rapidly, it had turned pink/rose & split into 2 streams side by side.

i rapidly took more photos until i looked up again (without the camera) & it had disappeared.  not even another half mile towards my home, i saw it again - or another one.  the same short stream of light, like a firework or shooting star - but pink.

what is this?  i have photos from my iphone.
content.summary: Saw what looked kinda like a star, after i shot the 1st photos & looked back up it had split into 2 streams of pink light traveling like a shooting star.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north along hwy 662 in bayou l'ourse, i saw two lights in the sky just above the texas gas plant. the two glowing orbs was about 10 feet wide and they were changing colors randomly blue, red, green, orange, white...As i got just in front of the gas plant one object turned blue and darted to the east in a ziz-zag path...It darted left-then right and them it was gone in a streak...The other came over the road and hovered above me. i could look up and see it at the top of my windshield. it continued to change colors but had a white glow to the other edge of the round orb shape. i was afraid to let it follow me home..So i kept driving toward labadieville on hwy 398. it stayed above me just above the tree tops along the road. it didn't make any sound it was a ball of light which had an eternal glowing light changing to blue, white, green, red, just about every color known. it was beautiful...Just as i was calming down and getting more interested in what it was...It moved higher and faster and continued till it went out of sight...The time from the fist sighting to when the second one went out of sight was no longer 10-12 minutes. i only wish i had a way to record what i experienced...I know no one would believe me.
content.summary: Two glowing orbs changing colors

content.detailedDescription: I just sent a report but do not know if it was sent properly, so if this is a duplicate please disreguard. my stepdaughter recently took a trip to the mountains. she took some photos with her blackberry playbook. after reviewing them she seen objects in the photos. knowing that i watch ufo informatiuon on tv, she showed them to me. it seems there is a object in the photo with a airsteam behind it. the stream is in the top right of the object, making it seem that it is going downward. when i asked if she seen anything she said no she was not paying attention, and neither was her grandmother. wish i was there! you need to see this picture. she said they just were driving and stopped to photograph the mountain tops. so have a look at this. its pretty cool!
content.summary: Step took photos of objects in the mountains

content.detailedDescription: My stepdaughter just took a trip with family to the north carolina mountains. she took alot of photos with her blackberry playbook. knowing that i watch ufo stuff on t.V. she just showed me that there are objects in the sky above the mountains in several photos. well, the device she used allowed me to zoom in quite well. and it seems that whatever it is has an air stream behind it. well actually its more like coming from the top right of it at an angle. like its moving downward. its really crazy! and me being a believer am convinced its a ufo. this is not a joke! and there is a little reflection from the sun on it. i am a little upset i was not there. i asked her if her or anyone else seen it. and she said that she wasn't paying attention and her grandmother wasn't either. you have to see this! i can't stop looking at it! my girlfriend is trying to download them to this pc as we speak. not working out to well at the moment. i am not to well with computers.
content.summary: My step-daughter just got back from the mountains. she took alot of photographs with her blackberry playbook.And there are objects in them. uexplained ones!

content.detailedDescription: My stepdaughter just took a trip with family to the north carolina mountains. she took alot of photos with her blackberry playbook. knowing that i watch ufo stuff on t.V. she just showed me that there are objects in the sky above the mountains in several photos. well, the device she used allowed me to zoom in quite well. and it seems that whatever it is has an air stream behind it. well actually its more like coming from the top right of it at an angle. like its moving downward. its really crazy! and me being a believer am convinced its a ufo. this is not a joke! and there is a little reflection from the sun on it. i am a little upset i was not there. i asked her if her or anyone else seen it. and she said that she wasn't paying attention and her grandmother wasn't either. you have to see this! i can't stop looking at it! my girlfriend is trying to download them to this pc as we speak. not working out to well at the moment. i am not to well with computers.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking down the street,(wadepark st. walking west.It was a nice night.And iwas by tge chruch that me and my bother had boy scout meeting. and i just happen to look up and i seen some lights? and i thought that it was a helicopter, i wsa three lights on it.It did not move or made a sound. so i ran back to were i live  an told my twin bother. and told him to come back with me to see it. butwhen we got back it was not there. it did not move up or down.The lights was yellow and i thank green but it was so long ago. thank you!
content.summary: It was about dusk and i was walking to the church that we were haveing boy scout meeting.,

content.detailedDescription:
on march 31, 2012 - last weekend, i was driving just outside of cheyenne, wy on the i-80.   i was just taking a mini road trip with my dog, zolie,  to see tourist spots, etc...  i stopped to see the "tree in the rock."  it is located in between cheyenne and laramie.  i took a picture of my dog in front of the tree.  i did not see anything at the time or even a few days later.

last night, i was making a "facebook skin" with pictures from the trip.  when you load the pictures up, they are very  zoomed in.  this is when i saw it.   it looks metallic & a typical "saucer" shaped when zoomed in.  some additional information, there are no airports close by or anything that would be in that flight path.  it is very rural, etc... f.E. warren afb is approx 25 miles away (i work there).   i have attached the regular picture and then i zoomed it in and cropped it with just the windows photo viewer.  in the original photo, it is on the upper middle left.  it looks just like a black dot. its very hard to see.  but, when you zoom in, you can see it; it is "saucer" shaped & perhaps metallic because it appears to give off a reflection.  its better to look at the original & zoom in.  when you look at the original picture, there is a small black dot in the upper middle left area.  (below the board & under the small whispy cloud).  i took the picture on my iphone4.

thanks :)
location:  buford, wy
content.summary: Ufo in background of picture?

content.detailedDescription: I was driving past a friends house. not sure why i looked up but i looked up and to my left "north" and saw two shiny objects flying side by side. at that point they looked like two black lines like this "/ /" one on the right looked a little higher, then they spread apart and started moving around each other like they were playing or dancing. now they looked more like a boomerang but with less angle. like birds with no head or tail. they weaved in and out, over and under each other. i had to stop my car there were trees starting to obstruct my view but like they knew i was watching and losing sight one seemed to move back and to the left of the tree so i could see it. the other one was gone. i drove up  so i could see better but they were both   gone. there was no sound at all, both solid black and shiny. they were very low and seemed very small. i'm not sure if i made the right selection above about the size. they looked big enough for only one person to fit and as low as planes i've  seen coming in to land. it was the most amazing maneuvers i have ever seen. they seemed to be having fun.
content.summary: Two black boomerang ufo's

content.detailedDescription: Driving home along the freeway saturday night i saw a sling shotting glowing object in the sky. i tried multiple times to take a picture of it, but it moved very quickly this way, then that way. i snapped several photos, but didn't think i got anything...Until today when i checked all my photos on the computer. i saw that i had caught it in the corner of the shot, just barely. i have two photo's one is raw and one has been cropped, enlarged, sharpened and the contrast and brightness was removed so you can really see it in good detail. surreal.
content.summary: When i enlarg and crop the photo it looks like a giant computer chip

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving on international drive towards world center drive, south of seaworld.  a large grouping of orange lights were visible to our right as we drove south.   we turned into our hotel on world center drive and
got out of our car to a clear area.  the sky was full of these light orange lights, probably 30-40 initially, at varying positions in the sky.
they traveled in a group from northwest to southwest between univeral and
disney.  as the group moved from our right to our left viewing area, they disappeared as they reached our left viewing area, while new orange objects continued to travel from our right viewing area.   i would describe them as traveling at a consistent speed in a horizontal plane.

we did not know what they were, and ruled out balloons, fireworks, commercial planes, etc.  with so many of these aircraft, we became very concerned and called the front dest of the royal caribe.   they said other guests had seen them as well, and wrote it off as "fireworks."  these were absolutely not fireworks, as i am an air force officer who has flown military aircraft and know what a flying object looks like versus disney fireworks.  about 5-10 minutes later, they had all disappeared.  we went inside our hotel and googled "stange odjects in the sky" and found a video from lincoln, nebraska that clearily showed exactly what we had just seen:
a large grouping of orange objects traveling together with no sound.
content.summary: Large group of ufos over orlando- april 2012

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on the porch around midnight, looking east-southeast over caswell beach area.....Bright white streak from behind shot out over the atlantic ocean....The front end began to expand and then the entire vision disappeared
i would have said a shooting star but the way it expanded into a sort of tadpole shape is something i've never seen before....
content.summary: Streaking white light with tail...Expands and then disappears

content.detailedDescription: Just found this site after searching for ufo sightings in my area, and what do you know... there was a similar sighting really close by on the same night! but anyways, me and a buddy of mine were driving to another friends house last night around 10 pm when i noticed an odd colored flying object. i live 30 miles from whiteman airforce base, soo i see lots of different aircraft flying around all the time. stealths, f-18's, military helicopters, lots of stuff. but this light wasnt moving at all at first, which is what caught my attention. that and i have never seen a usa craft with an amber/burnt orange color light that wasn't flickering. it stayed solid one color the whole time we were viewing it. as we approached our friends house we got out of the car to get a better look at it. by this time it looked like it was heading towards us in a slow moving line. it wasnt bobbing, or making any sudden movements. it wasnt giving off any sound! as it crept closer moving in the same line, me and my buddy pulled out our phones and turned on our strobe light apps. (im not really sure why i didnt pull out the video camera app instead)but as we were flashing our strobe lights at it, it made a 45 degree turn away from us and took off faster than i have ever seen anything move in my life! we watched the orb go from clearly visable and rather large, to smaller than a star until it wasnt visible at all. sighting didnt last long at all, 3-5 mins tops! ive claimed to my friends ive seen some weird things before, but this had to have been the strangest thing ive seen personally. considering going to by an hd camera soo if something like this ever happens again, i can be sure to catch it on video.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over pleasant hill, mo

content.detailedDescription: Coming home in the convertible and looked up and there was just this circular ball moving side ways and then behind a cloud and the next day a black helicopter flew directly over our house and today we drove to my grand fathers and i saw a ufo over there and i haven't seen another black helicopter yet.
content.summary: Circular ball moving sideways and then behind a cloud

content.detailedDescription:
Driving north on highway 70 toward marysville, california, at about 8:35 p.M. on april 8, 2012 (between plumas lake and marysville).   noticed a line of four amber sphere-like lights in sky directly above the highway.  pulled over and observed lights. got out of car, and stood along roadside. lights moved from west to east over highway, and then they reconfigured from single file to a triangle pattern and one by one the lights disappeared. while standing along the road, another witness who had pulled over, came running up and said, "you saw that, right?  i'm not crazy?"   i confirmed that i had indeed seen the same thing.  

when i got home, i learned that my wife had also, seen the same four lights, and had pulled over ahead of me, but left before i did, as she didn't see them anymore.  

we had been driving two separate cars, from the same location and were essentially, following each other to the next destination.    so at least three of us saw the same thing at the same time.

i thought it might be planes or helicopters as beale air force base is very near there, but these lights had no sound, and did not appear to be attached to anything, and there were no strobes or landing lights (apparent).

i don't know what it was, but it wasn't conventional in terms we understand.  not planes, not helicopters.   don't know. 

tried to take photo with cell phone, but had no memory to do so.
content.summary: 4 amber lights in straight line (continuous glow), changed pattern to triangle configuration, and lights went out one by one.

content.detailedDescription: I just got into ufo's about maybe a month and a half ago and started meditating a couple of weeks ago i only say this because i know some people say that that might have something to do with ufo"s anyway i was outside hitting the tennis ball against the wall when i thought i saw a star in the top of my peripheral vision i turned around to get the tennis ball when i suddenly realized this could be i immediately turned around and i think it was in different spot but im not sure anyway when i turned around it was moving a little faster than a plane and it looked like two orbs stuck together and it also had an outside aura like thingy and it sorda looked like a sideways egg i guess. and it was moving pretty steadily when i turned around i did it to call my dad and right before the 2 or 3 time i turned around it got extremely bright and i immediately turned around and it was gone.
content.summary: Like t 0rbs stuck t0gether or sideways eggs

content.detailedDescription: Object appeared to be moving due east when first observed. went outside to look.    yellow white center with three orange flames ( i thought ) two up an one center down. as we observed it flying over the flames were stationary and angled back to points. no trail and no sound. it appeared to travel on an arcing path, not straight line and did not loose altitude. last see over ontario, canada.
content.summary: Orange red, moving from west to south east on an arcing or curved line,no sound, no trail.

content.detailedDescription: It was appox 6:40 a.M. stopped at intersection faceing east decided to take pic of sunrise sky. when i down loaded it to pc saw this
content.summary: Stopped to take pic of sunrise, saw this when i downloaded

content.detailedDescription: I did not see them my self, however my brother in law sent me this photo.
content.summary: Texas city red lights on april 7 2012

content.detailedDescription: I walked to the store looked up and saw a glowing red orange white and yellow disc in the sky i watched it for 5 min as it went up quickly then out of no where a big helicopter which looked like a government black helicopter went up to it and they both stopped like they were staring at each other then the helicopter turned around and circled the area as the ufo flew up and vanished and eventually the helicopter flew away
content.summary: Medium flaming disc with white orange red and yellow coming from it

content.detailedDescription: I was taking photos around my family's house on april 7th, 2012.  when i uploaded the pictures to my computer, i noticed a weirdly-shaped orb in one of them.  i showed it to a friend and she said it looked like a cigar-shaped "ufo" and that i should submit it to mufo.  i did not notice the object in the sky when i took the picture.  it was a sunny day.  i have other photos i took that afternoon, and see nothing in any of them.  the orb or whatever is shaped really strangely, though, and i wanted to submit it.  the first photo is straight from the camera, the second, i cropped and used some contrast in photoshop to try and get a better idea of the shape.
content.summary: Took a photo of farmland, found an odd shape in the sky when i uploaded pictures

content.detailedDescription:
I saw (witness) 3 ufo's about 10,000 ft at around 2pm, they were all 3 one on top of the other, maybe 800 to 1000 feet apart. bright like an intense beam of light, like a halogen lamp. the lowest one made a quick right turn and flew into a cloud. the next one up, moved down to the first ones position and then made a quick right turn and followed the first into the same cloud. the 3rd light moved down a bit slower (still very fast) and had a trail of light behind, until it moved into the position of the last light. then it moved into the cloud (quick right) and dissappeared into it. 
about 2 minutes later, the cloud(the only cloud in the sky) dissappeared, and there was nothing.It was the only cloud in the sky also.....It was a beautiful and clear day!

later that night i was looking in the sky after my curiosity had a hold of me, and observed the moon and a small round throbing and pulsating light near by the moon. i did take videos of this light and have those videos now. i didn't think about it until now, hoping to get some answers. 

i am an x us navy veteran, and i know what i see to be a fact. i and have a pretty good knowledge of many type's of aircraft. i have also worked very close to aircraft carriers in the pacific ocean. i have these videos and would like to share them with someone who would be interested and helpful in telling me what it was that i saw!

please contact me and give me a report!

thank you,

stephen mccandless
veteran of foreigh wars (viet nam)

*************** this sight will not let me send the video! i tried but i keep getting an error. i have posted the video on my (facebook page: stephen mccandless lives in willmar minnesota and from manhattan beach calif..)**************************************

  i did make a report of the first lights after they happened......I cannot remember the exact date
content.summary: After seeing 3 ufo's (no photo) at about 2pm.....Later that night about 9pm

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on the 5 freeway coming close to the 22 and 57 freeway, i noticed a huge black shape in the sky in front of me. it appeared to be hovering on the left side of the freeway.  i stared at it because it looked to be the size of a jumbo airplane when it's arriving at an airport and you see it pass over you. except this was not a plane. i tried to figure out if it was a blimp but it had no logos or lights other than two small flashing lights that i could see.  in my opinion one was red and one was orange. the lights were one on the right and another on the left side, both towards the bottom. the kept thinking the shape almost seemed rectangular. it was like an elongated oblong. i drove very slow when i noticed it and noticed that although the traffic was flowing, the traffic slowed down with me.  i am sure many people questioned themselves also what this could be. i tried to get a good view but it appeared to be over the underpass of the freeways so when i passed the underpass, i pretty much lost view quickly. it all happened so fast, i didn't have time to configure my cell to take pictures or video, while driving and trying to make sense of what i was witnessing. it was too dangerous because of the traffic to fumble with my phone. the day was still light but in process of turning dark.  by the time i passed the underpass, it seemed everyone had their lights turned on. it quickly became dark.  this happened at approximately 7:45pm on 4/06/2012. i just kept thinking that i couldn't wait to get to a computer and see if anyone was able to take pictures or video. i kept wondering if this was a ufo or a government craft i've never seen before. the fact that it was hovering first then very slowly moving towards the city of orange on the other side of the freeway was strange and inconsistent with what a military craft would do. i don't think it was a blimp because i've seen blimps. that's not what this looked like. there was no visible cabin that i could see. it appeared very close, just over the 57 freeway. maybe as close as the top of a tall palm tree. i couldn't wait to share my experience with friends.  the thought that this could be a ufo was exciting. i looked for other testimonies as soon as i was able to. to my surprise i found a few but not as many as i hoped to find. a couple of my friends laughed when i mentioned it on facebook. i took it very seriously. i wouldn't joke about something like this.
content.summary: Saw huge black elongated oblong shaped object passing over the  frwys 5, 57 and 22 from santa ana heading to orange, ca

content.detailedDescription: I take alot of pics,from my house.This particular one at first,looked like a normal pic.,until something caught my eye in the upper right-hand corner.I have tried and tried to explain this,to no avail.We have a small house without any satellite dish.There is nothing above our house....I have similiar pics,about in the same position and there is nothing there.I don't know if it was hovering-slowly passing by,or anything.It was just caught on my photo.I also have another ariel object that i sent in a couple of yrs.Ago,that was caught on caamera.It is baffling-to say the least.I will include that photo again.No one has ever had any answers for these...
content.summary: Did not notice object,while taking pic of sunset
